author: Karissa Bell
title: WhatsApp adds new stickers to support social distancing
description: WhatsApp is giving its 2 billion users an extra reminder about the importance of staying home during the coronavirus pandemic. The app is rolling out a new set of  “together at home” stickers as part of its wide-ranging effort to turn the messaging service in…
content: WhatsApp is giving its 2 billion users an extra reminder about the importance of staying home during the coronavirus pandemic. The app is rolling out a new set of  “together at home” stickers as part of its wide-ranging effort to turn the messaging service in… [+454 chars]
